metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000025 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GNOME Web (Epiphany) 3.23 before 3.23.5, 3.22 before 3.22.6, 3.20 before3.20.7, 3.18 before 3.18.11, and prior versions, is vulnerable to apassword manager sweep attack resulting in the remote exfiltration ofstored passwords for a selected set of websites.

criterions.comment: epiphany: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
epiphany-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
